thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: mindy freedman
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by mindy freedman

author: mindy freedman
title: mindy freedman
text: Years ago we found Robin Sabine, now at NamuTravel, who helped us plan an amazing trip to Costa Rica. We since have used her services again and referred her out to many many families. Everyone who has used Robin quickly grows to appreciate her experience, in-depth knowledge, professionalism and kindness. Would not hesitate to say she is a trusted resource and a must for Costa Rican travel!
